# üåü About Me

Hi, I'm Jacky. I'm a Machine Learning Engineer at [Deledao](https://www.deledao.com) and recently graduated from [Fei Tian College - Northern Campus](https://feitian.edu/) with a Bachelor of Science in Data Science, *Magna Cum Laude*.

I am passionate about technology, leveraging data-driven approaches to solve real-world problems, and continuously expanding my technical skill set. While I mainly focus on the engineering aspect of Machine Learning, I'm no stranger to DevOps, Full-Stack, the list goes on. 

Since I'm still early in my career, there is a lot to learn from the field. I will continue my education by pursuing a [MS in Quantum Computing](https://qc.northernonline.org/) to stay ahead of the curve while striving to be a part in revolutionizing the K-12 Ed-Tech landscape with Machine Learning. 

::: {.callout-tip appearance="simple"}
## However...

This is my website, so I will tell you more about myself. I believe in making the world a better place, something that always starts at the individual level. 

:::


Practicing [Falun Dafa](https://faluninfo.net/what-is-falun-gong-falun-dafa/), an ancient spiritual practice rooted in Buddhism, has strengthened my resolve in doing what is right in the current state of affairs. 

On a social level, I've written for the health department at [The Epoch Times](https://www.theepochtimes.com/author/mingjia-jacky-guan) on topics such as immune exhaustion, soaring egg prices, and everything else in-between. 

At the academic level, I enjoy helping peers and students with their work as an instructor and drafting up lecture notes for the next batch of undergraduates. After putting my DevOps experience to good use at [Sunregen Healthcare AG](sunregen.com), contracting as a system administrator, I am now serving as a Technical Solutions Architect at my own company, [MG Solutions](solutions.mguan.org). [Reach out to me](qmd/contact.qmd) and let's grab a (virtual) coffee to see how I can help you automate and scale your business. 

![Stowe 2025](figures/stowe.jpeg){fig-align="center"}

At the same time, I've been skiing since 2008 and run my own little [channel](https://www.ganjingworld.com/s/Dvjmz0zQy3) where you can check out my videos.
